title: Size discrepencey of libAten.so on same binary
body_html:
I am trying to understand the pytorch pip binary available on pytorch.org and manually building using the build_wheel.sh available under builder repository.

The interesting thing is pytorch.org pip binary for python-2.7 is of size 75MB while using the build_wheel.sh its size is 49 MB.

I am building for CPU with NO_CUDA=1 and pytorch.org binary is also for cpu.
After extracting the wheel package I found that

pytorch.org binary has libATen.so of size 100MB
build_wheel.sh produces binary has libAten.so of size 11M

After extracting the wheel package I found that

body:
I am trying to understand the pytorch pip binary available on pytorch.org and manually building using the build_wheel.sh available under builder repository.

The interesting thing is pytorch.org pip binary for python-2.7 is of size 75MB while using the build_wheel.sh its size is 49 MB.

I am building for CPU with NO_CUDA=1 and pytorch.org binary is also for cpu. 
After extracting the wheel package I found that 

pytorch.org binary has **libATen.so** of size **100MB**
build_wheel.sh produces binary has **libAten.so** of size **11M**
